subject: This is James Williams  CIA Sp
body:
This is James Williams  CIA Special Agent,
 I order you to stop
cooperating with scammers I have investigated your phone text messages
and email as I where able to break into it
 and find out that you have
being dealing with fake delivery agent scammers also fake Bank which
you believe some are real but they’re not, 
I therefore order you to
stop dealing with them failing to do so means you will face a jail
term of 3 years
, All those emails and numbers you have on your phone
which claimed to have some money for you are all scammers and I order
you to quit chatting with them immediately as your compensation fund
worth $15 million have being in our custody which will proceed to be
delivered to your address through FedEx or DHL, Reconfirm your full
address below to avoid wrong delivery l’ll be waiting to hear from you
?

subject: Re: This is James Williams  CIA Sp
body:
Hello James Williams,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your concern and the information you have shared. It's quite alarming to hear that there are scammers trying to deceive me. I will definitely take your advice seriously and stop communicating with them.

Could you please provide more details about how my phone and email were compromised? I want to make sure I understand the situation fully. Also, if my funds are in your custody, how can I be assured of their safe delivery through DHL?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Connie
